description.narrative: The Project's Development and Global Environment Objective is to reduce land degradation and improve land productivity in selected watersheds in targeted regions in Ethiopia.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Fiduciary capacity | Description: The Recipient shall appoint no later than three months after the Effectivenessdate a chief accountant, a senior accountant, an accountant at the federal MoA SLMP Project Support Unit, and sixty mobileaccountants at the Regions to cover both regional and Woreda level accounting assignments, all with qualifications, experience andterms of reference satisfactory to IDA. | Due Date :16-Jun-2014
Finance Agreement: Safeguards | Description: The Recipient shall implement the project in accordance with the relevant SafeguardsInstruments. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: 4. Households using cut-and-carry practices for backyard livestock management
